name: OtherPregnancyOutcome
title: Other Pregnancy Outcome
description: (Clinical Focus: Observations that are specific types of pregnancy counts that are not included in the GPA or TPAL systems, such as induced abortions, spontaneous abortions, still births, etc. Recorded values for these observations are whole numbers.),(Data Element Scope: An observation with a whole number count value),(Inclusion Criteria: Specific pregnancy outcomes that are not included in the GPA or TPAL systems.),(Exclusion Criteria: Pregnancy outcomes that are included in the GPA or TPAL systems.)
